content.question: Which of the following graphs could represent these data in a semi-log plot, where the vertical axis is logarithmically scaled?

choices.label: The data points have the following approximate coordinates: (1 comma 30) (2 comma 50) (3 comma 83) (4 comma 139) (5 comma 231) The five points in the graph appear to have an increasing, concave up pattern.

The data points have the following approximate coordinates: (1 comma 1.477) (2 comma 1.699) (3 comma 1.919) (4 comma 2.143) (5 comma 2.364) The five points in the graph appear to have an increasing, linear pattern.

content.answer: The data points have the following approximate coordinates: (1 comma 30) (2 comma 50) (3 comma 83) (4 comma 139) (5 comma 231) The five points in the graph appear to have an increasing, linear pattern.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
